sen.j: 虎拳（とらけん）は、襖をしめて、左右の部屋で、虎・女物・鉄砲のいずれかを身につけて待ち、襖を開くと、虎女（和藤内（＝鄭成功）の母）鉄砲（和藤内あるいは加藤清正）虎という三すくみで勝負がつく拳遊び。
sen.e: Toraken is a game in three Japanese rooms divided by shut Fusuma (Japanese sliding door) where people choose to wear or hand a tiger costume, women's clothes (implies Torajo, literally, a tiger woman, the mother of Watonai, another name of Seiko TEI (Zheng Chenggong)) or musket (implies Watonai or Kiyomasa KATO) which were in three-way standoff, and then open the fusuma and run off to decide who wins.
